name: Frightful Firearms
description:
Inspired by Modest Zero's video, the premise is generally the same being Gun Game but the weapons you swap out will continue to be active and shoot however while Modest Zero went with the trap route I wanted to go with them being possessed, Ghosts will arm themselves with whatever weapon you drop and will shoot at both you and Slimes alike.

Controls:
> W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys to move
> Left or Right click to shoot
> Space Bar to start/restart
